verses.esv:
31   but if he is caught, he will pay sevenfold;
    he will give all the goods of his house.
verses.kjv: 31 But if he be found, he shall restore sevenfold; he shall give all the substance of his house.
verses.niv: 31 Yet if he is caught, he must pay sevenfold, though it costs him all the wealth of his house.

verses.esv:
24   If Cain’s revenge is sevenfold,
    then Lamech’s is seventy-sevenfold.”
verses.kjv: 24 If Cain shall be avenged sevenfold, truly Lamech seventy and sevenfold.
verses.niv: 24 If Cain is avenged seven times, then Lamech seventy-seven times."
